Articles.Content:
1 minute ago, AR3S_TGL said:

I'm starting a group of interplanetary explorers called AR3S Industries.

It will focus on KSS.

Anyone that wants to can join!

What exactly is the purpose/intent of the group?

Just now, Calvin_Maclure said:

What exactly is the purpose/intent of the group?

Read the page.
I like the idea of this. It sounds like a player-inclusive, roleplay-involved mission report.

2 minutes ago, JadeOfMaar said:

I like the idea of this. It sounds like a player-inclusive, roleplay-involved mission report.

That's what I was aiming for.

LIVE Interactive Map for KSS (currently in development)

https://bubbl.us/NDA2MjU3NC84MDE4Mzg5LzE4MzE4ZWI4ZmQwNjBkM2Y5MGQ4ZDkwMzE5MzkyODc0-X?s=8018389&utm_source=shared-link&utm_medium=link

 

This is what it's starting to look like:

Edited May 8, 2017 by Voodoo8648

On 5/3/2017 at 4:13 PM, RobFalcon said:

Kinda giving ideas from the sidelines, since I haven't been able to give this a try quite yet myself, but something came to mind after I read this. 

Previously you mentioned adding in compatibility for OPM, though suggested it to be in the form of an aging star which had consumed all its inner planets.  Maybe, instead, use this revised Kerbin as a planet in that system, give it some inner planets to balance out the OPM ones?

And a side question: With a 'stock' Kerbin in KSS, do you think Kerbin-Side would play nicely with KSS?  If unsure, I could download a copy of KSS 0.6, give it a try, and report back.

I believe StarCrusher already has plans for the Kerbin texture
Thanks for letting the mod fans vote, that puts you ahead of many other creators!

27 minutes ago, A_beholder said:

Thanks for letting the mod fans vote, that puts you ahead of many other creators!

We are generous gods...

On 5/5/2017 at 1:14 AM, Greatness101 said:

@Voodoo8648 What mods do you typically use? I saw some interesting icons on the side of your tutorial video

@Greatness101 Sorry I didn't respond earlier. Here is my list of mods. this is the list I pulled from CKAN, but there are some other mods installed that are not listed here, like Infernal Robotics for example and others

Spoiler

19 hours ago, StarCrusher96 said:

Pretty!

Happy 600th @StarCrusher96!

On ‎07‎/‎05‎/‎2017 at 3:16 PM, StarCrusher96 said:

When traveling for more than 812 years  

It takes 9 with warp drive...

20 minutes ago, AR3S_TGL said:

It takes 9 with warp drive...

Which warp drive are you using? Alcubierre (which is what I'm seeing in your screenshots) doesn't take more than a few hours

3 minutes ago, TheSpacePotato said:

Which warp drive are you using? Alcubierre (which is what I'm seeing in your screenshots) doesn't take more than a few hours

I was using gravity breaks and orbiting planets.

2 minutes ago, AR3S_TGL said:

I was using gravity breaks and orbiting planets.

Gravity breaks? You mean gravity assists?

No breaks. I was slowing my velocity as I couldn't orbit planets. In a gravity break you go in front of the planet to give it some gravitational energy, resulting in your speed decreasing.

I call the process SCIENCE! #Futurama

5 minutes ago, AR3S_TGL said:

No breaks. I was slowing my velocity as I couldn't orbit planets. In a gravity break you go in front of the planet to give it some gravitational energy, resulting in your speed decreasing.

I call the process SCIENCE! #Futurama

Well, I suppose as long as you dont go THROUGH the planet, you should be good!
